name: 書報討論（三）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【IWM0073  書報討論（二）】 ◎課程開放上修
description:
本課程將透過授課、實作、專題等方式，培養學生人力資源發展知識與實務能力、培養其跨文化管理之知能，並且強化其溝通之能力，協助學生成為國際人資之專業人才。
This course aims at cultivating students' knowledge and practical ability in human resource development, cross-cultural management and interpersonal communication, helping students become international talents through lectures, practice and projects.
goals: 培養學生人力資源發展的專業能力 Cultivate students' professional ability of human resource development
強化人力資源溝通與輔導職能  Enhance communication and counseling competence for human resource work
培養其跨文化管理之專業 Develop competence in cross-cultural management
強化國際視野與溝通能力 Strengthen international vision and communication skills
syllabus:
**Course Description**

This course is designed for all students to learn together by doing projects related to IHRD instructional goals. The goals are:

1\. To cultivate the professionals of human resource development and management.

2\. To cultivate the professionals of international and cross-cultural management.

This course combines these two goals. Students will also learn HRD research and practice through these projects.

**Main Topics**

1. HRD research projects

2\. HR practical missions

3\. Group sharing 

4\. Advanced research related issues (research design, data collection method, data analysis method, APA format, etc.)

Week 1  Course Introduction, Syllabus Review, project kick off

Week 2-3  HRD research overview - research design

Week 4-5  IHRD conference preparation, reflection

Week 6-7  HRD research overview - data collection method

Week 8 - 9  Invited speeches

Week 10 -11  Field trip, HRD research overview - data analysis method

Week 12  Internship sharing

Week 13-14  HRD Research overview - data analysis method and writing Format

Week 15  IHRD Professional Practice Conference

Week 16-18  Professional Practice Proposals

methodologies.note: 使用講述的方式，說明重要概念 Use lecture to illustrate important concepts
讓同學在課堂中，針對議題進行討論及分享 Let students discuss and share in class
同學分為小組，共同合作以完成任務 Students are divided into groups to work together to complete the task.
需將課堂所學概念，實際運用，並撰寫紀錄 Students apply the concepts learned in class into practice and write a report
使用用影音媒體，輔助教學內容 Media, audio, visual materials

grading.note: 課堂口頭報告 Class presentation
期末報告 Final integrated paper
